text: @WhiteHouse @realDonaldTrump If you believe the curve has remain flat over the weekend in the U.S by state read this: https://t.co/FWqV1n4Tv9  The final statistics of Covid-19 on deaths will not include those people who die from complications associated with Covid19 at a later date.
